import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import'./ColorPicker.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ColorPicker=_ref=>{let{value,onChange,label='Цвет'}=_ref;const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const pickerRef=useRef(null);// Предустановленные цвета
